extendedInfo.description: Put frames around your photos to make them square shaped. This app makes all photos compatible with Instagram without having to crop photos. Now you can get your whole photo in Instagram.Features of Photo Squarer:- Add borders/frames to photos to make them square- Makes all photos compatible for instagram and other social networks- Can zoom out & zoom in of photos- Can choose any color to be photo frame- Never crop photos again to make compatible with instagramPlease contact developer before giving bad ratings. We hope to fix any issues you have quickly!Tags:Photos to square, square photos, square for instagram, square picture, square photos, square pictures, square camera, instagram squareSquareIt, InstaFitIt, SquareReady, squaring photos, instagram squarer, square frame, square frames, square image, InstaSize, instasize, #square, insta square maker, Square Instasize

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.comment: Great app, its better than \"Squareit.\" Quality is beautiful. Awesome job! :D
reviews.author: Jenny Cabrera

reviews.title: Great! But..
reviews.comment: I really like this app. But PLEASE create a resizing option. Sometimes I want to zoom in on my picture but it doesn\'t zoom closer than my original picture size. You should be able to resize or zoom in closer on a picture. I would have to go edit my picture to the size I want THEN use the app again so it takes too many steps to find the perfect size. Overall it\'s great. Thanks!
reviews.author: Donna Luong

reviews.title: Great but Zoom In needs to improve
reviews.comment: Great app. Zooming function is really handy but Zoom In needs bit improvement to allow zooming in above original dimensions as Donna Loung pointed out
reviews.author: Nauman Afzal

reviews.title: Good. BUT..
reviews.comment: When I go to share a photo from my fb app it won\'t allow me to SAVE it to my phone it only saves AFTER the Fact of me Sharing it from PhotoSquare itself. -___- #LAME!
reviews.author: Amberlynn Astacio

reviews.title: Best keyboard!!!
reviews.comment: This keyboard is awesome!! Have downloaded other keyboards but no one can beat SwiftKey.. Very accurate and I can use up to 3 languages at the same time without having to toggle spacebar to change the language..  Would rate 5 stars but please please please please add emoji support!!! Other keyboards support it..  Why SwiftKey doesn\'t??  It\'s all it needs!
reviews.author: V\303\255ctor Aguirre

reviews.title: Love this!!!
reviews.comment: This didn\'t work at first but it somehow magically started working and I absolutely LOVE it. So simple and easy and it does exactly what I want for my instagram pictures. Maybe it lessens the quality of the pic but other then that its perfect!!
reviews.author: Katelyn O\'Leary

reviews.title: One more function mayb?
reviews.comment: Great app! So far is the best square fit in play store, but it would be the best if you guys could add another function which is can recomposition the picture  instead of just adjusting the pic in center. KEEP IT UP!
reviews.author: Kenta Choo

reviews.title: Best quality, now add EXIF info!
reviews.comment: Thanks for the best output quality app of it\'s kind on the Play Store! SquareIt and Photo Grid HD only output at 1064 x 1064.
reviews.author: Jonathan Moran

reviews.title: Resize
reviews.comment: Amazing App! But, please create a resize! Or update the photo squarer to shape our photos! Thanks! (:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: Need zoom option and photo quality option,thanks
reviews.author: IChzm Zt

reviews.title: #Fab
reviews.comment: From a scale To 1-5 I\'m at a 1000 Cause this application Is So fabulous ! & very easy To use . Totally Recommend
reviews.author: Zayna Snyder

reviews.title: Yaay
reviews.comment: Really like it, works just like photo squaredy on iphones. I wish you can move the pic around but im fine with this
reviews.author: Tina Leng

reviews.title: Love the app!
reviews.comment: This app is definitely the best free I used to square images for Instagram! The other apps ruin my photos\' quality. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!
reviews.author: Alecs Lao

reviews.title: Recommend it
reviews.comment: Easy, fast, great quality. Awesome outcome. I love It & use it all the time.
reviews.author: ashley soto

reviews.title: Won\'t save pictures to my phone
reviews.comment: This app worked fine for several months. Now it doesn\'t. Uninstalled and reinstalled. Still won\'t save pictures to my phone. Tried the sharing option. That doesn\'t work either.
reviews.author: Clinton Schilb

reviews.title: 5 stars.
reviews.comment: It works very well on my phone.I do love this app \'cause it allows me to zoom in and zoom out my photo, which is very cool. But, I wish that this app has this feature to sample selected color from my photo so that my photo suits the background. I can\'t wait for it! Thank you.
reviews.author: nik habibah

reviews.title: Very helpful.
reviews.comment: This is a really good app for all the instagram users for uploading un cropped images!
reviews.author: Jigar Karia

reviews.title: This is Excellent!
reviews.comment: Its perfect for Instagram! I\'ve never had a problem uploading anything, from pictures I take to downloads. I\'m impressed and satisfied with this :3
reviews.author: Allison Plesha

reviews.title: yeah ok
reviews.comment: it\'s good for what its made for... but it lowers my picture quality.
reviews.author: Kayla Acasio

reviews.title: Great App!!!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s great for making your pictures fit on instagram! You can save to your gallery or put it straight to instagram!
reviews.author: Mari Bravo
